summary: At the top of the rugged Bosnian mountain, young shepherd Mehmed patiently watches over his cows and lovingly carves the figure of a woman in a piece of wood. Almost on cue, a novice ... See full summary »
cast: Audrey Hamm|Aleksandar Seksan|Haris Burina|Nada Djurevska|Anita Kajasa|Rastko Jankovic|Jasna Diklic|Bozidar Bunjevac|Fadil Karup|Narcis Babic|Vedrana Bozinovic|Emina Muftic|Milan Pavlovic|Muhamed Aljovic|Denis Hadzijusufovic|Ermin Sijamija|Angel Morales|Omar Kustric|Daniel Gorbea|Zoran Andric|Mirsad Abaz|Elvedin Brkic|Izet Kutlovac|Zijad Aljovic|Almir Cehajic
title: Nebo iznad krajolika
